newsitem.title: POLAND: POLISH BOURSE KERB BOND DEALS - JANUARY 7.
newsitem.headline: POLISH BOURSE KERB BOND DEALS - JANUARY 7.

text.p: Turnover in kerb trade through the Warsaw Stock Exchange was at 27.1 million zlotys on Tuesday.
The following is a summary of the day's block transactions on the Warsaw bourse.
* 117,816 varable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 9, 1997 traded at 103.8 zlotys.
* 115,424 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 9, 1997 traded at 103.9 zlotys.
* 9,608 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on May 9, 1998 traded at 103.8 zlotys.
* 1,100 fixed-interest two-year bonds maturing on October 12, 1998 traded at 92.95 zlotys.
